property.description: The name of the property in the object to check.

value.description: The value of the property to check.

conditions.description: The conditions to join in a group.

anyOf.description: Includes. A string in a substring. A set contains an element. A list contains an element.
Not Includes. A string not in a substring. A set does not contain an element. A list does not contain an element.
In. A element is in a set.

EntityCondition<JsonLdNodeObject>.description: Type defining condition for entities filtering.

LogicalOperator.description: The logical operators for condition combining.

profile.description: The profile(s) this policy conforms to. IRIs identifying the ODRL Profile(s).

assigner.description: The assigner of the policy. Applies to all rules unless overridden at rule level.

assignee.description: The assignee of the policy. Applies to all rules unless overridden at rule level.

target.description: The target asset for the rule.

action.description: The action associated with the rule.

inheritFrom.description: The parent policy(ies) this policy inherits from. IRIs identifying the parent Policy(ies).

permission.description: The permissions in the policy. At least one of permission, prohibition, or obligation must be present.

prohibition.description: The prohibitions in the policy. At least one of permission, prohibition, or obligation must be present.

obligation.description: The obligations in the policy. At least one of permission, prohibition, or obligation must be present.

PapCreateRequest.description: The body of the request - the policy to create (uid will be auto-generated).

cursor.description: The cursor for the next page of results, if there are more results available.

PnpContractNegotiationResponse.description: The state of the policy or an error.

assetType.description: The asset type for the locator.

resourceId.description: A resource identifier for the locator.

id.description: The primary id used by the provider.

correlationId.description: This is used by the other side of the negotiation.

policyId.description: The unique identifier for the policy.

dateCreated.description: The date and time when the negotiation was created.

expires.description: The expiration time for the policy negotiation if it's a manual process.

callbackAddress.description: The callback address to send updates to the requester.

code.description: A reason code for when the negotiation errors.

reason.description: A more detailed reason for the negotiation error.

description.description: A more detailed reason for the negotiation error.

handlerId.description: The id of the handler, on provider side this is the negotiator, on consumer side this is the requester.

interventionRequired.description: Is manual intervention required to complete the negotiation?

PolicyNegotiation.description: Interface describing a rights management policy negotiation.
